summary:
Global leader with over 15 years’ experience in Europe and USA working in large, multi-national organizations.  Demonstrated ability to grow revenue, solve complex problems, manage ambiguity, and deliver results.  Skilled in strategy & innovation, digital transformation, product management, and commercial execution in the animal health, human healthcare, science, and technology industries.  Proven track record of leadership in diverse businesses and markets.  Extensive experience managing cross-functional teams across multiple geographies (EMEA, USA, APAC) in highly matrixed environment.  Motivating leader who empowers teams to aspire towards ambitious goals.  Strong professional reputation as credible change leader, gained from heading transformative initiatives at global, multi-national, reputable companies in the US, UK, and Europe.

Specialties: 
•Commercial execution: map the right products and services for customers, forge strategic partnerships, deliver on commercial goals

•Business development: identify new opportunities, build business case to take to market, evangelize teams to bring to customers 

•Building & developing teams: attract high achievers, create aspirational goals, coach team members to elicit top performance

•Digital transformation: leverage trends to drive innovation and create commercial value to accelerate growth

•New product development / Product management: develop and drive a concept through to commercial offer.  Commercial development for portfolio of products and solutions.  Identify new market and customer segments, formulate product strategy, manage vendor negotiations, partnership development

•M&A strategy and integration: formulate strategy vis-à-vis existing product portfolio and customer base, evaluate targets, support deal structure and negotiation and run post-merger integration.  Evaluate build-buy-partner decisions

•Change management: shepherd teams in times of transition, reassure customers and partners, identify new opportunities for growth

•Innovation: define disruptive business models for rapidly transforming industry, rethink customer experience and value proposition, redesign/reorganize businesses to best address market opportunity
